PropertyValue.Value: select sta.station_cn_name, devType.device_name, t1.device_id, t1. para_type, case t1.para_version_type when '01' then '当前版' when '02' then '将来版' when '03' then '历史版本' end para_version_type, t1.para_version dev_version, t.para_version local_version, t1.update_date, t1.update_time from para_version_info t right join para_dev_version_info t1 on t.para_type = t1.para_type and t1.para_version_type=t.para_version_type left join basi_station_info sta on sta.station_id = subStr(t1.device_id, 1, 4) left join basi_dev_type_info devType on devType.Device_Type = subStr(t1.device_id, 5, 2)
